attributes.title: Can You Hear Me Now?
attributes.caption: Team SAFR is back baby! And they're tasked with helping bring communication back to the besieged city of Kuchinashi!
attributes.description: Team SAFR is back baby! And they're tasked with helping bring communication back to the besieged city of Kuchinashi!
attributes.display_title: S2:E1 - Can You Hear Me Now?

attributes.title: Out of the Woods, Into the Fire!
attributes.caption: SAFR finds themselves in a bit of pickle as to just how many child deaths are acceptable.
attributes.description: SAFR finds themselves in a bit of pickle as to just how many child deaths are acceptable.
attributes.display_title: S2:E2 - Out of the Woods, Into the Fire!

attributes.title: Sewer Sanctuary!
attributes.caption: After ruining the way of life for an entire camp of nomads team SAFR returns to Kuchinashi to find out their next step.
attributes.description: After ruining the way of life for an entire camp of nomads team SAFR returns to Kuchinashi to find out their next step.

attributes.title: Evident Evidence
attributes.caption: Team SAFR come to the conclusion that the best way to save the city is to storm the police station!
attributes.description: Team SAFR come to the conclusion that the best way to save the city is to storm the police station!

attributes.title: Escape Tank-tics!
attributes.caption: Team SAFR decides that, sometimes, running is the best option.
attributes.description: Team SAFR decides that, sometimes, running is the best option.

attributes.title: He's not Tacco, he's GiveO
attributes.caption: A flashback through Asher's past shows us a glimpse into Team SAFR's future.
attributes.description: A flashback through Asher's past shows us a glimpse into Team SAFR's future.
attributes.display_title: S2:E6 - He's not Tacco, he's GiveO

attributes.title: A Rebellious Reunion
attributes.caption: A blast from Ashers past brings forward new opportunities for team SAFR.
attributes.description: A blast from Ashers past brings forward new opportunities for team SAFR.

attributes.title: The Fast and the Furriest
attributes.caption: The SAFR Family is in trouble as they try and rob a caravan of heavily armed trucks, Also Pyke tries to drive under one of the trucks in his sweet Honda Civic.
attributes.description: The SAFR Family is in trouble as they try and rob a caravan of heavily armed trucks, Also Pyke tries to drive under one of the trucks in his sweet Honda Civic.
attributes.display_title: S2:E8 - The Fast and the Furriest

attributes.title: One is the Funniest Number
attributes.caption: With Grimm hot on our heroes' heels they need to come up with an escape plan fast before team SAFR cracks under their wight.
attributes.description: With Grimm hot on our heroes' heels they need to come up with an escape plan fast before team SAFR cracks under their wight.
attributes.display_title: S2:E9 - One is the Funniest Number

attributes.title: In Search of Taupe
attributes.caption: With Taupes worrying and sudden disappearance team SAFR rushes to find the missing junior Hunstmen in training.
attributes.description: With Taupes worrying and sudden disappearance team SAFR rushes to find the missing junior Hunstmen in training.

attributes.title: Hana't Today!
attributes.caption: The rescue mission turns into more of a fight for your lives mission as team SAFR meets the infamous Vermillion.
attributes.description: The rescue mission turns into more of a fight for your lives mission as team SAFR meets the infamous Vermillion.

attributes.title: Airship Hijinks
attributes.caption: Team SAFR discovers the Wave gangs plans to smuggle some Artifacts out of Kuchinashi via an airship. Naturally the team starts to scheme how to stop that from happening.
attributes.description: Team SAFR discovers the Wave gangs plans to smuggle some Artifacts out of Kuchinashi via an airship. Naturally the team starts to scheme how to stop that from happening.

attributes.title: Pykes Tykes!
attributes.caption: With an army of tween warriors SAFR start their assault on the Wave gangs airship, splitting the team into SA and FR, because what could go wrong with that.
attributes.description: With an army of tween warriors SAFR start their assault on the Wave gangs airship, splitting the team into SA and FR, because what could go wrong with that.

attributes.title: When Life Gives You Lemons
attributes.caption: Now that Team SAFR has made it onto the Wave Gang's airship they have to figure out their next plan of attack.
attributes.description: Now that Team SAFR has made it onto the Wave Gang's airship they have to figure out their next plan of attack.
attributes.display_title: S2:E14 - When Life Gives You Lemons

attributes.title: RWBY: The Grimm Campaign (RTX)
attributes.caption: Cheer on the good, good guys and gals from RWBY: The Grimm Campaign as they take on a special mission. See just how often we roll a critical failure live, in person. We'll also probably be drinking, so you know it will be fun!
attributes.description:
Cheer on the good, good guys and gals from RWBY: The Grimm Campaign as they take on a special mission. See just how often we roll a critical failure live, in person. We'll also probably be drinking, so you know it will be fun!
Featuring: Eddy Rivas, Chad James, Laura Yates, Chris Kokkinos, Kerry Shawcross, A Dragon, A Dungeon.
